text: The top of the Demon's Spire.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: It's kind of hard to believe I'm at the last floor.
speaker: zatt_neutral

text: I guess I should be happier...
speaker: zatt_sad

text: Well holy shit kid! I'll be a lot happier once I'm done with you.
speaker: queen

text: What is it with you humans? You're always running around wrecking my stuff.
speaker: queen

text: I'm away for like, one day!
speaker: queen

text: It takes just one goddamn day for you to break into my home, kill all my staff, and even rearrange my furniture.
speaker: queen

text: Oh Shadow Queen, please don't eat me! I never wanted to be a Wizard of the Board.
speaker: zatt_yelling

text: Why would I eat something as foolish and misguided as you?
speaker: queen

text: It's the end of the line for you, kid.
speaker: queen
